passages.text: [[Please help! I am currently watching a client's bird and I'm a bit out of my depth here. Lately at night the bird has been making weird sounds. I'm worried it might be sad or maybe worse! Like sick or something. If you have an advice please advise.->making weird sounds]]

links.name: Please help! I am currently watching a client's bird and I'm a bit out of my depth here. Lately at night the bird has been making weird sounds. I'm worried it might be sad or maybe worse! Like sick or something. If you have an advice please advise.

passages.name: Weird sounds from bird

passages.text:
[[So, the sounds aren't exactly like the normal chirps I hear throughout the day. It almost resembles like a machine?->normal chirps]]

[[The sound, I know it sounds stupid, but it kinda resembles the freezer?->freezer]]

links.name: So, the sounds aren't exactly like the normal chirps I hear throughout the day. It almost resembles like a machine?
The sound, I know it sounds stupid, but it kinda resembles the freezer?

passages.name: making weird sounds

passages.text:
[[Yeah, like a freezer! I know that birds can mimic sounds... but that's a bit odd don't you think? Is this a health concern?->health concern]]

[[Or something else?->something else]]

links.name: Yeah, like a freezer! I know that birds can mimic sounds... but that's a bit odd don't you think? Is this a health concern?
Or something else?

passages.name: freezer

passages.text: [[So Peachy, that's the bird's name, can make all sorts of sounds! She can say hello, make water droplet noises... Oh! She can mimic the door bell too! It gets really confusing sometimes when I hear the door bell and there is no one there. Like all of these are pretty normal sounds that make sense for her to make, but the freezer noise just doesn't.->freezer]]

links.name: So Peachy, that's the bird's name, can make all sorts of sounds! She can say hello, make water droplet noises... Oh! She can mimic the door bell too! It gets really confusing sometimes when I hear the door bell and there is no one there. Like all of these are pretty normal sounds that make sense for her to make, but the freezer noise just doesn't.

passages.name: normal chirps

passages.text:
[[So I took Peachy to the vet yesterday and they assured me that she is doing fine! They aren't sure why she is making the weird the noise, but suggested maybe the owner's struggle to close the freezer->close the freezer]]
[[Or maybe... I should stay up and see why she does it.->stay up]]

links.name: So I took Peachy to the vet yesterday and they assured me that she is doing fine! They aren't sure why she is making the weird the noise, but suggested maybe the owner's struggle to close the freezer
Or maybe... I should stay up and see why she does it.

passages.name: health concern

passages.text: [[Hmmm, maybe I should stay up and see what she does if she does the noise again tonight?->stay up]]

links.name: Hmmm, maybe I should stay up and see what she does if she does the noise again tonight?

passages.name: something else

passages.text:
[[I inspected the freezer and I don't see much wear and tear. The seals seem fresh and it suctions pretty good, so if I was a mythbuster, I would call this BUSTED! Seriously though... I'm stumped. Do you think it is something to worry about?->worry about]]
[[Don't worry about it?->don't worry]]

links.name: I inspected the freezer and I don't see much wear and tear. The seals seem fresh and it suctions pretty good, so if I was a mythbuster, I would call this BUSTED! Seriously though... I'm stumped. Do you think it is something to worry about?
Don't worry about it?

passages.name: close the freezer

passages.text:
[[Oh geez! Now I'm starting to get paranoid! I was reading up on birds and something dawned on me. Like, you have to say things alot for a bird to mimic it. So... the poor thing is forced to mimic the freezer?! Did they do something to this bird?!->something to this bird]]
[[or am I overeacting?->overeacting]]

links.name: Oh geez! Now I'm starting to get paranoid! I was reading up on birds and something dawned on me. Like, you have to say things alot for a bird to mimic it. So... the poor thing is forced to mimic the freezer?! Did they do something to this bird?!
or am I overeacting?

passages.name: worry about

passages.text: [[Peachy is gone. They took her.->they took her]]

links.name: Peachy is gone. They took her.

passages.text: [[Help me. Why are they so gray? I can't make out their face. Its ALL FUZZY! WHY IS IT FUZZY?! WHY IS EVERYTHING SO FUZZY->gray]]

links.name: Help me. Why are they so gray? I can't make out their face. Its ALL FUZZY! WHY IS IT FUZZY?! WHY IS EVERYTHING SO FUZZY

passages.name: they took her

passages.text: [[You're right. They are probably puting this precious bird in the freezer! Dear lord... What is wrong with them?! Even if they aren't doing something this drastic, that means they are keeping the freezer open and tormenting this bird! I mean, they are always away for all their camping trips out in the woods and poor Peachy has to find nannys. I'm going to take this bird and figure out whats going on!->take this bird]]

links.name: You're right. They are probably puting this precious bird in the freezer! Dear lord... What is wrong with them?! Even if they aren't doing something this drastic, that means they are keeping the freezer open and tormenting this bird! I mean, they are always away for all their camping trips out in the woods and poor Peachy has to find nannys. I'm going to take this bird and figure out whats going on!

passages.name: something to this bird

passages.text: [[Yeah... I suppose you're right. I'll just let the bird do what it does. I mean, I don't really know the bird, maybe this is just a weird quirk huh? We all can sound a little funny when we snore. The parents will be home in a few days from camping out in the woods. They love to go camping! But they know their birdie gets lonely, so thats why I am here. Thanks so much! From me and Peachy both.->in a few days]]

links.name: Yeah... I suppose you're right. I'll just let the bird do what it does. I mean, I don't really know the bird, maybe this is just a weird quirk huh? We all can sound a little funny when we snore. The parents will be home in a few days from camping out in the woods. They love to go camping! But they know their birdie gets lonely, so thats why I am here. Thanks so much! From me and Peachy both.

passages.name: overeacting

passages.text: So last and final update. The people that had me watching their bird went missing... I feel kinda bad, but grateful I took Peachy away from that place. She would of been stranded! I hope they find her owners... but until then I guess I better go do some research on birds!
passages.name: take this bird

passages.text: [[Its now 1AM and she is doing it again. I'm going to see whats up.->see whats up]]

links.name: Its now 1AM and she is doing it again. I'm going to see whats up.

passages.name: stay up

passages.text: [[I don't know what I just saw. There was something outside in the backyard, I could see it through the sliding glass door. It was so big, it filled the whole yard. They have a large yard, like many dogs could run in it. I'm shaking->large]]

links.name: I don't know what I just saw. There was something outside in the backyard, I could see it through the sliding glass door. It was so big, it filled the whole yard. They have a large yard, like many dogs could run in it. I'm shaking

passages.name: see whats up

passages.text:
[[I don't know... I don't even understand what I saw. I think it spooked me so much because I almost fainted, however I fought through. When I came too... it was gone. What do you think? Did I halluncinate?->halluncinate]]
[[Or...was it real?->real]]

links.name: I don't know... I don't even understand what I saw. I think it spooked me so much because I almost fainted, however I fought through. When I came too... it was gone. What do you think? Did I halluncinate?
Or...was it real?

passages.name: large

passages.text: [[I probably am just tired and overeacting.->overeacting]]

links.name: I probably am just tired and overeacting.

passages.name: halluncinate

passages.text: [[So... everything I look up about this makes me feel like a loony toon... However. I don't feel safe here. I think I'm going to take this bird to my place with her carrier cage and just wait for her owners to come home from their camping trip.->take this bird]]

links.name: So... everything I look up about this makes me feel like a loony toon... However. I don't feel safe here. I think I'm going to take this bird to my place with her carrier cage and just wait for her owners to come home from their camping trip.

passages.name: real
